pkgmetadata.longdescription: LibFlatArray is a multi-dimensional C++ array class which provides an object-oriented view (a.k.a. array of structs, AoS) while internally storing data in a struct of arrays (SoA) manner. It comes with utilities to move data to CUDA enabled GPUs.

use.flag: Enables plugins for NVIDIA GPUs (e.g. CUDAAllocator)
